SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T0.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (
SELECT A.SYS_ID , A.WEBSVC_KND , A.SITE_URL , B.CODE_NM HTTP_STTUS_CODE , TO_CHAR(A.CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , A.MNGR_NM , A.MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES FROM COMTNHTTPMON A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.HTTP_STTUS_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
B.CODE_NM = #searchKeyword#
ORDER BY A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
) T0 ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(A.SYS_ID) as totcnt FROM COMTNHTTPMON A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE B ON B.CODE_ID = 'COM072' AND A.HTTP_STTUS_CODE = B.CODE WHERE 1 = 1
A.MNGR_NM LIKE '%'||#searchKeyword#||'%'
B.CODE_NM = #searchKeyword#

SELECT SYS_ID , WEBSVC_KND , SITE_URL , TO_CHAR(CREAT_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREAT_DT , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNHTTPMON WHERE SYS_ID = #sysId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNHTTPMON ( SYS_ID , WEBSVC_KND , SITE_URL , HTTP_STTUS_CODE , CREAT_DT , MNGR_NM , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES , FRST_REGISTER_ID , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , LAST_UPDUSR_ID , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #sysId# , #webKind# , #siteUrl# , #httpSttusCd# , TO_DATE(#creatDt#, 'yyyymmddhh24miss') , #mngrNm# , #mngrEmailAddr# , #frstRegisterId# , sysdate , #lastUpdusrId# , sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE COMTNHTTPMON SET WEBSVC_KND = #webKind# , SITE_URL = #siteUrl# , MNGR_NM = #mngrNm# , MNGR_EMAIL_ADRES = #mngrEmailAddr# , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #lastUpdusrId# WHERE SYS_ID = #sysId#
